survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on home networking equipment to improve product offerings and customer support.

questions.question_text: Which brand of home networking equipment do you currently use?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Ensure the list of brands is updated based on market trends.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice dropdown for this question.

script.question_text: Which brand of home networking equipment do you currently use?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your current home networking equipment?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice responses.
